nodes.text: An ornate, long-bodied blaster pistol of impeccable craftmanship, the Coronet Arms model was a typical design of dueling pistols. Often ordered in pairs, dueling pistols possessed a stopping power that made it equal to carbines and rifles, with a long frame that made them accurate. However, dueling pistols lost beam cohesion quickly, which limited their range and preventing them from carrying anymore than enough energy for a single blast.
